}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== With a mini and portable exterior, the 286 Mbps Wi-Fi 6 driver-free adapter W311MI fits securely into your computer and has no effect on the usage of neighboring ports. It contains an internal driver, which completes installation automatically once plugged into your computer without tedious installation steps.Therefore,you do not need to manually install the driver with a CD-ROM or a file downloaded from the internet. It is compatible with many operating systems concluding Windows 11, Windows 10, Windows 7, and Linux and UOS, to meet the requirements of various desktop and laptop users for wireless internet connections.
"10053437 V6.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{See also|Tenda|List of Tenda Wireless Devices}}
===Models=== :;[[Tenda]] *[[Tenda U2 v5]] • AX300 Wi-Fi 6 High Gain USB Adapter • [https://www.tendacn.com/product/overview/U2v5.html PPage] :FCC ID: V7TU2V5 (2023-11-01) • [[AIC]] AIC8800FC *[[Tenda W311MI v6]] • AX300 Wi-Fi 6 USB 2.0 Adapter • [https://www.tendacn.com/product/overview/W311MIv6.html PPage] :FCC ID: V7TW311MI6 (2023-05-26) • [[AIC]] AIC8800FC (2604:0013)
